title: New Alternative-Strategy ETF Offers Diversification: BlackRock's Rosenberg
description: Jeff Rosenberg, senior portfolio manager of systematic fixed income at BlackRock, joins "Bloomberg ETF IQ" to discuss the firm's new fund the iShares Systematic Alternatives Active ETF (ticker: IALT). (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Jeff Rosenberg, senior portfolio manager of systematic fixed income at BlackRock, joins "Bloomberg ETF IQ" to discuss the firm's new fund the iShares Systematic Alternatives Active ETF (ticker: IALT). (Source: Bloomberg)
